comment.author: 37206071@N03
comment._content: Wedding of Terry Hasse to Robert "Bubba" Grathwohl, Oct. 26, 1974, St. Mary's Catholic Church, New Ulm, Minnesota. Identified members of the wedding party: L-R: Keith Pehling (ring bearer); Robert "Bubba" Grathwohl (groom); Terry Hasse (bride); Kimberly Peterson Quirt (flower girl); Carmen Hasse Walder (bridesmaid); Penny Hasse (bridesmaid); Diane Steinback (bridesmaid); Father LeBlanc (officiant). Source: Interview with Terry Hasse, Mar. 7, 2011.
